description: A crowd-sourced tool for finding empty rooms.

home.contributeDetails: By contributing your schedules, you provide us with information about the classes in each room. This helps us to provide more accurate information to everyone.
home.contributeSuccess: Thank you for your contribution, {{name}}. You may contribute again if schedules are updated.

room.available: No classes are currently in this room.

login.title: Authorization
login.hint: Do you want to authorize <1>StudyThere</1> to use your following information?
login.privacy: SEIUE is a product operated by Beijing Yuehuo Education Technology Limited. By continuing to log in, you indicate your agreement to SEIUE's terms and conditions.

permissions.name: StudyThere will receive your real name.
permissions.eduId: StudyThere will receive your Beijing Education ID.
permissions.schedules: StudyThere will receive your calendar schedules.
permissions.noPassword: StudyThere will not be able to receive your password.

onboarding.error: An error occurred while logging in, please try again.
onboarding.welcomeMessage: You have successfully logged in as {{name}} and may enjoy all that StudyThere has to offer.
